mapper.update: update caidan set mingcheng=#{mingCheng}, url=#{url}, path=#{path}, fucaidanId=#{fuCaiDanId}, icon=#{icon}, paixu=#{paiXu} where isDelete =0 and id =#{id}
update caidan set isDelete = 1 where id=#{id} and isDelete=0

update caidan set isDelete=1 where isDelete=0 and id in
#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT cd.*,js.id as jsId, js.xianshimingcheng, js.juesemingcheng, js.isDelete as jsIsDelete FROM caidan cd LEFT JOIN juesecaidan jscd on cd.id = jscd.caidanId LEFT JOIN juese js on js.id =jscd.jueseId WHERE cd.isDelete = 0 and jscd.isDelete = 0 and js.isDelete = 0

SELECT DISTINCT cd.* FROM (SELECT t1.*, t2.id sid, t2.mingcheng smc,t2.url surl,t2.path spath, t2.fucaidanid sfcdId, t2.paixu spx, t2.isDelete sIsDelete, t2.icon sicon FROM(SELECT * FROM caidan WHERE isDelete=0 AND fucaidanId=1)t1 LEFT JOIN caidan t2 on t1.id=t2.fucaidanId WHERE t2.isDelete =0 or t2.isDelete is NULL)cd, (SELECT caidanId FROM juesecaidan WHERE isDelete=0 AND jueseId in(SELECT jueseId FROM yuangongjuese WHERE isDelete=0 AND yuangongid=#{yuangongid}))t3 WHERE cd.id = t3.caidanId OR cd.sid = t3.caidanId ORDER BY paixu,spx
select id, mingcheng,url path,fucaidanId,icon,paixu,isDelete from caidan where isDelete=0 and id=#{id}
select id,mingcheng, url,path,fucaidanId, icon,path,isDelete from caidan where isDelete =0 and mingcheng like concat('%',#{key},'%')
select exists ( select id from caidan where (fucaidanId =1 or fucaidanId =#{fuCaiDanId}) and mingcheng = #{mingCheng})
select id,mingcheng from caidan where isDelete=0 and (fucaidanId is null or fucaidanId =1)

SELECT t1.*, t2.id sid, t2.mingcheng smc,t2.url surl,t2.path spath, t2.fucaidanid sfcdId, t2.paixu spx, t2.isDelete sIsDelete, t2.icon sicon FROM(SELECT * FROM caidan WHERE isDelete=0 AND fucaidanId=1)t1 LEFT JOIN caidan t2 on t1.id=t2.fucaidanId WHERE t2.isDelete =0 or t2.isDelete is NULL

SELECT * FROM caidan WHERE id NOT in (SELECT DISTINCT fucaidanId FROM caidan WHERE fucaidanId IS NOT NULL) AND id in (SELECT caidanId FROM juesecaidan WHERE isDelete = 0 AND jueseId =#{jueSeId}) AND isDelete =0
